bibl.title: Studia Varia from the Paul Getty Museum. 2
bibl.note: Malibu, J. Paul Getty Museum, Acc. 82.AP.75. Lebanese cedar sarcophagus. One side panel depicts a banqueting scene, another an arched colonnade, an end panel has a circular design, and a top panel has painted geometric designs.
ELSTON Maya and Jeffrey MAISH, Technical Investigation of a Painted Romano-Egyptian Sarcophagus from the Fourth Century A.D.
Studia Varia from the Paul Getty Museum. 2 = Occasional Papers on Antiquities. 10 (Los Angeles, 2001) pp. 153-166, 22 figg.
